name: Chu Linh Thieu Nang
description:
-Made In Paint Engine 4. With Ultra "Physic" And Fake Tracing.

-This is an epic remastered of the legendary game Cat Mario. Same Level. Same Mechanics. Same Gameplay. But...There are differents. You...now a solder. Who...start a journey to....wait i forget it. Sorry.

- Enhanced Graphics. New Texture And Detail. New Sound Effects. All of It will make you Angry To HELL.                                                

- Smashing The Keyboard       Never Been More Satisfied Like This. Download And Play Now. 

-Now Available Some Easter Eggs Inside The Game And In The Game Folder And Files.

-Made By REscape.
